summary: Iteration 10 testing completed - All 14 requested features verified working: Login/Sidebar branding with dual logos, Dashboard filters (date+customer), Projects page filter panel, Created column with audit fields, and Access Control (non-owner view-only, admin full access, owner can edit).
passed_tests: Login page shows both logos side-by-side (YASH Technologies + YASH EstiPro)
Login page shows 'YASH EstiPro' title and 'Project Cost Estimator' subtitle
Dashboard date filter works (filters projects by created_at date)
Dashboard customer filter works (filters projects by customer_id)
Projects page has Filters button that toggles filter panel
Projects filter: Customer Name search works
Projects filter: Project Name/Description search works
Projects filter: Created By dropdown works
Projects list shows 'Created' column with user name and date
Non-owner users can only VIEW projects (not edit) - View buttons shown, Delete hidden
Admin users can edit any project - Edit+Delete buttons visible for all
Project creator can edit their own projects - Edit+Delete visible only for owned projects
critical_code_review_comments: Access control logic in Projects.js canEditProject() correctly checks user.role==='admin' OR created_by_id===currentUser.id
Dashboard date filter uses ISO string comparison (date_from T00:00:00, date_to T23:59:59) - working correctly
Audit fields (created_by_id, created_by_name, created_by_email) properly populated on project creation
Clone and Create-from-template endpoints correctly set new owner to current user
Legacy projects show '—' for created_by_name which is expected behavior
seed_data_creation: Created test_viewer@test.com user (role=user) for access control testing; created and deleted TEST_ViewerOwnedProject
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 10 features working. Key features: 1) Login/Sidebar has dual logos (YASH Tech + EstiPro); 2) Dashboard filters work (Date From/To, Customer dropdown); 3) Projects page has filter panel with 5 filters (Customer Name, Description, Created By, Date From, Date To); 4) Created column shows user+date (legacy projects show '—'); 5) Access control: non-owner sees View (eye) button, admin sees Edit+Delete, owner sees Edit+Delete for own projects only.

login_dual_logos.evidence: img[alt='YASH Technologies'] and img[alt='YASH EstiPro'] both present in Login.js

sidebar_dual_logos.evidence: Both logos visible in aside element on dashboard

dashboard_date_filter.evidence: API /dashboard/analytics accepts date_from/date_to params, filters correctly

projects_created_by_filter.evidence: data-testid='filter-created-by' dropdown with All Users option

projects_created_column.evidence: 'Created' header visible, rows show User icon + name and Calendar icon + date

access_control_non_owner_view.evidence: test_viewer sees 15 View buttons, 0 Edit buttons for non-owned projects

access_control_admin_edit.evidence: admin sees 15 Edit buttons, 15 Delete buttons

access_control_owner_edit.evidence: test_viewer sees 1 Edit+1 Delete for their own project (PRJ-0016)

api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/dashboard/analytics: No filter, date_from, date_to, date_range, customer_id - all PASS
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/projects: Returns projects with audit fields - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/projects: Creates project with created_by fields populated - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/projects/{id}/clone: Sets cloner as new owner - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/projects/create-from-template/: Sets current user as owner - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/users: Admin-only endpoint for Created By dropdown - PASS
